title: "Outer turrets will have a barricade in the early game that makes them more durable" -Riot PBE note
body: This is a good change, but can we also have turrets deal more damage? I'm not complaining because this buff is something we've been asking for a while now. Turret diving has become far less of a risk nowadays with damage being at an all time high, and buffing damage would be beneficial I feel.

Don't they already have this except for bot lane?

On live, it's just DR until a certain time.

From my understanding, with the upcoming changes, instead of it being resistances/DR, it's going to be basically 5 shields.

When a shield is broken, you (the destroyer, not the defender, of course) gain gold.

It's a way to reward people who do well against the turret in a way that doesn't just remove the turret from the defender.

That's a fair point.

Additionally, it's to try and prevent the "4 gank bot and take tower" issue that's been happening this season.  Had a game with a Caitlyn where the enemy tower was literally at 100 hp, but we got 5 man ganked, I died but Cait survived, but they just took our tower even though we had basically stomped that lane.  At least with this change Cait is rewarded for doing all that damage, even if she doesn't get the FB tower gold, she gets some gold for all her work.

Happens in other lanes too where, for example, the top laner repeatedly kills his laner, but happens to get ganked, kills both but dies, and his jungler walks up top and claims that gold.  Like, awesome that his team got the gold, but the top laner would've preferred to get that gold themselves after doing all the work.
Pretty sure it's in addition to the DR. There's no way they're gonna re-open the bot-top swap strat. It invalidates 90% of the top roster.
